comment.author: 62379908@N00
comment._content: I started teaching in a school built in 1924, but my classroom was in the new addition, built in 1936.  It was a brick building with squeeky floors, and a bit larger than the one in the picture.  The tank at the right must hold the water supply, but where is the bathroom?

comment.author: 22329267@N05
comment._content: Answer:  Probably out in "the bush."  Imagine walking to school out here, some in Wellingtons, and some barefoot.  Hardy little kids they are!
